mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard (num, id, title, content, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, viewCount, regdate) VALUES(freeboard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num, id, title, content, viewCount, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY num DESC) prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY num DESC) nextNum FROM freeboard ORDER BY num DESC) result1 WHERE num=#{num}

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num, id, title, content, viewCount, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY num DESC) prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY num DESC) nextNum FROM freeboard
OR id LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1 WHERE num=#{num}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, id, title, content, viewCount, regdate FROM freeboard
OR id LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
